pullRequest.title: fix(TBD-9791): Update to dom4j 2.1.1
pullRequest.bodyText:
Please check if the PR fulfills these requirements

 The commit(s) message(s) follows our guidelines ?
 Unit tests for the Java changes have been added (for bug fixes / features) ?
 TUJ for the JavaJet changes have been added (for bug fixes / features) ?
 Docs have been added / updated (for bug fixes / features) ?
 The new code does not introduce new technical issues

What is the current behavior? (You can also link to an open issue here)
What is the new behavior?
BREAKING CHANGE
If this PR contains a breaking change, please describe the impact and migration
path for existing applications.
If not please remove this section.
Other information:

commit.message: fix(TBD-9791): update dom4j lib for tPigLoad
fix(TBD-9791): update dom4j lib for tPigStoreResult

nodes.bodyText: I don't see old version of this lib in talend-update or mvn repository. Could you please confirm it was missing?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -731,13 +731,11 @@
 				MVN="mvn:org.talend.libraries/pig-0.11.1.1.3.0.0-107/6.0.0"
 				UrlPath="platform:/plugin/org.talend.libraries.pig/lib/pig-0.11.1.1.3.0.0-107.jar"
 				REQUIRED="false" REQUIRED_IF="LOCAL=='true'" />
-			<IMPORT NAME="dom4j" MODULE="dom4j-1.6.1.jar"
-				MVN="mvn:dom4j/dom4j/1.6.1"
-				UrlPath="platform:/plugin/org.talend.libraries.dom4j-jaxen/lib/dom4j-1.6.1.jar"
+			<IMPORT NAME="dom4j" MODULE="dom4j-2.1.1.jar"
+				MVN="mvn:dom4j/dom4j/2.1.1"
 				REQUIRED="true" />
-			<IMPORT NAME="jaxen" MODULE="jaxen-1.1.1.jar"
-				MVN="mvn:org.talend.libraries/jaxen-1.1.1/6.0.0"
-				UrlPath="platform:/plugin/org.talend.libraries.dom4j-jaxen/lib/jaxen-1.1.1.jar"
+			<IMPORT NAME="jaxen" MODULE="jaxen-1.1.6.jar"
+				MVN="mvn:com.xceptance/jaxen/1.1.6"

nodes.bodyText: New version doesn't exist nor in talend-update or in mvnrepsoitory. This version exists with different groupId: org.dom4j, link with missing: https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/dom4j/dom4j; link to correct: https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.dom4j/dom4j

commit.message: fix(TBD-9791): fix group id for dom4j
